statements: SELECT * FROM user_devices ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE last_seen > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%iPhone%';
SELECT user_id, device_name, last_seen FROM user_devices ORDER BY last_seen ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY last_seen DESC;
SELECT device_name, last_seen FROM user_devices WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE last_seen > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT user_id, device_id, device_name, last_seen FROM user_devices WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4) AND device_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY last_seen ASC;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE last_seen < '2022-03-01' AND device_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT user_id, device_id, device_name FROM user_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_id, user_id FROM user_devices;
SELECT * FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_id FROM user_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT user_id, device_id, auth_token, last_auth_timestamp FROM user_device_auth;
SELECT * FROM user_devices
SELECT device_id,device_name,user_id FROM user_devices WHERE user_id=1
SELECT user_id,device_name FROM user_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM user_devices
SELECT user_id, device_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE device_id IN (1,2,3)
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile'
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices WHERE device_id > 100
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT d.device_name, u.username FROM devices d INNER JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT d.device_name, u.username FROM devices d INNER JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM user_devices;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_devices;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, last_login FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, r.role_name FROM devices d JOIN user_devices ud ON d.device_id = ud.device_id JOIN user_roles ur ON ud.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT COUNT(*), u.user_id FROM user_devices ud JOIN user_roles ur ON ud.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT authentication_token, authentication_time FROM device_authentications WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY authentication_time ASC;
SELECT session_token, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL AND user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT log_description FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 3 AND log_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT session_token, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 2 AND logout_time IS NULL ORDER BY login_time DESC;
